summary.span: 命名空間包含的類別可用來搭配 Web 伺服器應用程式中的 ASP.NET 使用者設定檔。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that are used to work with ASP.NET user profiles in Web server applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 設定檔用來儲存和擷取資料來源，例如資料庫中的使用者設定。ASP.NET profiles are used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database. 使用設定檔提供者會管理設定檔資訊和屬性值。Profile information and property values are managed by using a profile provider. 可以使用 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫中儲存設定檔資訊類別，或自訂資料來源所使用的實作中抽象類別。Profile information can be stored in a Microsoft SQL Server database by using the class, or in a custom data source by using an implementation of the abstract class. 可以使用設定 ASP.NET 設定檔[設定檔](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))組態區段。ASP.NET profiles are configured by using the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section. 當應用程式啟動時，已啟用的設定檔時，ASP.NET 會建立新類別的型別`ProfileCommon`，該項則繼承自類別。When an application starts that has profiles enabled, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 強型別存取子會新增至`ProfileCommon`類別中定義的每一個屬性[設定檔](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))組態區段。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property that is defined in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section. 執行個體`ProfileCommon`類別已設定的值為屬性與目前物件。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property of the current object. 您可以建立自訂設定檔實作繼承自抽象類別，定義中未指定的使用者設定檔的內容[設定檔](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))組態項目。You can create a custom profile implementation that inherits from the abstract class and that defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element.
